bibl.title: Notes on Menander's Kolax, Koneiazomenai, Leukadia, Misoumenos and Perinthia.
bibl.note: By-products of work devoted to the papyrus and book fragments of various plays during preparation of a second volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander: Kolax 40-42 Sandbach; fr. 10 Sandbach2 = P. Oxy. L, 3534; Koneiazomenai 3-4; Leukadia fr. 257 Körte-Thierfelder; Misoumenos 297 Sandbach = 698 Arnott; Perinthia 13-17; fr. 4 Sandbach = 5 Körte-Thierfelder; frs. 6 + 7 Sandbach = 3 + 8 Körte-Thierfelder
ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Notes on Menander's Kolax, Koneiazomenai, Leukadia, Misoumenos and Perinthia.
